42243.name: Average weekly hours worked (women, 15+) (OECD Labor Force Statistics (2017))
42243.description: Average usual weekly hours worked on the main job, for women ages 15+. Estimates correspond to total declared employment. This includes part-time and full-time employment, as well as self-employment and dependent employment.
42243.datasetName: Female weekly hours worked â€“ OECD (2017)

source.name: OECD Labor Force Statistics (2017)
source.additionalInfo:
Original source notes: 
Part-time employment is defined according to a common definition of less than 30-weekly-usual hours worked in the main job. 

Full-time employment is defined according to a common definition of more than 30-weekly-usual hours worked in the main job. 

Information for all countries and all LFS subjects may be found in the attached file : 
www.oecd.org/els/employmentpoliciesanddata/LFSNOTES_SOURCES.pdf.
